oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The death of the !kau |han kass'o's mother sends him to collect water and kills the leveret (hare) while he is away. |han kass'o' is upset and his mother tells him a story () to soothe him. She tells him not to play with meat (animals that will be eaten).
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: How |han kass'o's pet leveret was killed
